short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension overides the html mailto: default and copys the email to your clipboard instead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When installed, this app will overide the mailto in an html link and just copy the email address to your clipboard rather than opening up your default mail client.
